price: Haikufunuliwa kwangu isipo kuwa ya kwamba hakika mimi ni mwonyaji dhaahiri.
arabic: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ
footnotes: Na mimi sikufunuliwa kwa Wahyi ila kwamba hakika mimi ni Mtume wa kukufikishieni Ujumbe wa Mola wangu Mlezi kwa njia iliyo wazi kabisa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: in yūḥā ilayya illā annamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
